name: Zach Kurfirst
bio: Hi, I'm Zach - a technical marketer-turned software engineer living in New York City! I recently graduated from General Assembly's Software Engineering Immerseive program, where I learned a diverse range of programming languages and frameworks, including JavaScript, Python, React, Express, and Django. I created four projects along the way, each of which you can check out below!
background: In my previous roles, I spearheaded the implementation of CRM and marketing automation platforms, oversaw the development of websites, mobile applications, and drove customer engagement via personalized email marketing campaigns.
wrap: I'm excited to now merge my marketing expertise with my newfound technical skillset as I navigate the dynamic realm of software engineering!
